guild.name: satire

title: Democrats Push To Keep Schools Closed So Kids Will Be Dumb Enough To Accept Socialism

author.bio: Just a guy who re-posts what he finds on 9gag.
author.bio_html: Just a guy who re-posts what he finds on 9gag.

body: Clever article (BB is good stuff), but I feel like they were doing more harm in schools by actually teaching the supposed benefits of socialism (especially on college campuses).
body_html: Clever article (BB is good stuff), but I feel like they were doing more harm in schools by actually teaching the supposed benefits of socialism (especially on college campuses).

post.title: Democrats Push To Keep Schools Closed So Kids Will Be Dumb Enough To Accept Socialism

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Nah, Democrats want to promote socialism in school and keep kids there as much as possible to have absolute control of their knowledge. That's why Obama wanted to extend the school day and year, they want to break people when they're young and turn them into unquestioning robots who carry out their orders.
body_html: Nah, Democrats want to promote socialism in school and keep kids there as much as possible to have absolute control of their knowledge. That's why Obama wanted to extend the school day and year, they want to break people when they're young and turn them into unquestioning robots who carry out their orders.
